refnamediv.refpurpose: Netatalk compatible UNIX file utility suite.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: ad is a UNIX file utlity suite with Netatalk compatibity. AppleDouble AppleDouble files in .AppleDouble directories and the CNID databases are updated as appropiate.

para.programlisting:
-l Long Output [-u: unix info]:
<unixinfo ...> <FinderFlags> <AFPAttributes> <Color> <Type> <Creator> <CNID from AppleDouble> <name>
FinderFlags (valid for (f)ile and/or (d)irectory): d = On Desktop (f/d) e = Hidden extension (f/d) m = Shared (can run multiple times) (f) n = No INIT resources (f) i = Inited (f/d) c = Custom icon (f/d) t = Stationery (f) s = Name locked (f/d) b = Bundle (f/d) v = Invisible (f/d) a = Alias file (f/d)
AFPAttributes: y = System (f/d) w = No write (f) p = Needs backup (f/d) r = No rename (f/d) l = No delete (f/d) o = No copy (f)
Note: any letter appearing in uppercase means the flag is set but it's a directory for which the flag is not allowed.
